short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have photos of 'Dia de Muertos' as your new-tab background in memory of the victims of the earthquakes of September 2017 in Mexico.
short.es: Ve fotos del Día de Muertos en cada nueva pestaña en memoria de las víctimas de los terremotos de Septiembre en México.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that lets you admire the beauty of this ancestral celebration during your daily routine while at the same time giving you the option to help the victims of the earthquakes of September 2017 that affected Mexico.
long.es: An extension that lets you admire the beauty of this ancestral celebration during your daily routine while giving you the option to help the victims of the earthquakes of September 2017 in Mexico at the same time.
